explanation: [0-0] An elderly woman with a purple wig and a white sweatshirt is standing outdoors, holding an elongated bottle of Fanta. The floor is gray, and the background features a row of trees and a massive building.
[0-2] The elderly woman opens her mouth wide and raises the bottle in front of the camera.
